docs.text: Welcome to Machine Setup This microsite contains commands and dotfiles for programmers. There are many ways to install a software. This is a curated list of best ways to install software on your machine.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: This microsite contains commands and dotfiles for programmers. There are many ways to install a software. This is a curated list of best ways to install software on your machine.
docs.title: Welcome to Machine Setup

docs.text: Visual Studio Code ubuntu sudo snap install code --classic echo -e "\nfs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288\n" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf sudo sysctl -p DBeaver CE ubuntu sudo snap install dbeaver-ce Insomnia ubuntu sudo snap install insomnia Github Desktop https://github.com/shiftkey/desktop ubuntu export VERSION = "2.9.0-linux2" wget https://github.com/shiftkey/desktop/releases/download/release- $VERSION /GitHubDesktop-linux- $VERSION .deb -O /tmp/githubdesktop.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/githubdesktop.deb
docs.title: IDE

docs.text: ubuntu sudo snap install code --classic echo -e "\nfs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288\n" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf sudo sysctl -p
docs.title: Visual Studio Code

docs.text: ubuntu sudo snap install dbeaver-ce
docs.title: DBeaver CE

docs.text: ubuntu sudo snap install insomnia
docs.title: Insomnia

docs.text: https://github.com/shiftkey/desktop ubuntu export VERSION = "2.9.0-linux2" wget https://github.com/shiftkey/desktop/releases/download/release- $VERSION /GitHubDesktop-linux- $VERSION .deb -O /tmp/githubdesktop.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/githubdesktop.deb
docs.title: Github Desktop

docs.text:
Git config git config --global alias.ch checkout git config --global alias.br branch git config --global alias.cm commit git config --global alias.st status git config --global alias.lgs "log --pretty --oneline" git config --global credential.helper store git config --global push.default current git config --global core.editor "nano" git config --global pull.ff only git config --global user.name "" git config --global user.email "" ASDF linux git clone https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf.git ~/.asdf --branch v0.8.1 echo -e "
. \$HOME/.asdf/asdf.sh
" >> ~/.bashrc echo -e "
. \$HOME/.asdf/completions/asdf.bash
" >> ~/.bashrc source ~/.bashrc asdf update Python ubuntu sudo apt-get install -y build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev \ libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev \ xz-utils tk-dev libffi-dev liblzma-dev python-openssl VERSION = 3 .8.8 asdf plugin add python asdf install python " $VERSION " asdf global python " $VERSION " asdf reshim python Nodejs linux VERSION = 14 .16.1 asdf plugin add nodejs asdf install nodejs " $VERSION " asdf global nodejs " $VERSION " Dotnet linux VERSION = 5 .0.401 asdf plugin add dotnet-core asdf install dotnet-core " $VERSION " asdf global dotnet-core " $VERSION " Golang linux wget https://golang.org/dl/go1.16.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz -O /tmp/golang.tar.gz sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go && sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf /tmp/golang.tar.gz echo -e "
export PATH=\$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin
" >> ~/.bashrc Conda ubuntu curl https://repo.anaconda.com/pkgs/misc/gpgkeys/anaconda.asc | gpg --dearmor > conda.gpg sudo install -o root -g root -m 644 conda.gpg /usr/share/keyrings/conda-archive-keyring.gpg sudo gpg --keyring /usr/share/keyrings/conda-archive-keyring.gpg --no-default-keyring --fingerprint 34161F5BF5EB1D4BFBBB8F0A8AEB4F8B29D82806 echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/conda-archive-keyring.gpg] https://repo.anaconda.com/pkgs/misc/debrepo/conda stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/conda.list sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install conda -y source /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh conda init conda config --set auto_activate_base false
docs.title: Programming

docs.text: git config --global alias.ch checkout git config --global alias.br branch git config --global alias.cm commit git config --global alias.st status git config --global alias.lgs "log --pretty --oneline" git config --global credential.helper store git config --global push.default current git config --global core.editor "nano" git config --global pull.ff only git config --global user.name "" git config --global user.email ""
docs.title: Git config

docs.text:
linux git clone https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf.git ~/.asdf --branch v0.8.1 echo -e "
. \$HOME/.asdf/asdf.sh
" >> ~/.bashrc echo -e "
. \$HOME/.asdf/completions/asdf.bash
" >> ~/.bashrc source ~/.bashrc asdf update
docs.title: ASDF

docs.text: ubuntu sudo apt-get install -y build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev \ libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev \ xz-utils tk-dev libffi-dev liblzma-dev python-openssl VERSION = 3 .8.8 asdf plugin add python asdf install python " $VERSION " asdf global python " $VERSION " asdf reshim python
docs.title: Python

docs.text: linux VERSION = 14 .16.1 asdf plugin add nodejs asdf install nodejs " $VERSION " asdf global nodejs " $VERSION "
docs.title: Nodejs

docs.text: linux VERSION = 5 .0.401 asdf plugin add dotnet-core asdf install dotnet-core " $VERSION " asdf global dotnet-core " $VERSION "
docs.title: Dotnet

docs.text: linux wget https://golang.org/dl/go1.16.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz -O /tmp/golang.tar.gz sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go && sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf /tmp/golang.tar.gz echo -e "\nexport PATH=\$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin\n" >> ~/.bashrc
docs.title: Golang

docs.text: ubuntu curl https://repo.anaconda.com/pkgs/misc/gpgkeys/anaconda.asc | gpg --dearmor > conda.gpg sudo install -o root -g root -m 644 conda.gpg /usr/share/keyrings/conda-archive-keyring.gpg sudo gpg --keyring /usr/share/keyrings/conda-archive-keyring.gpg --no-default-keyring --fingerprint 34161F5BF5EB1D4BFBBB8F0A8AEB4F8B29D82806 echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/conda-archive-keyring.gpg] https://repo.anaconda.com/pkgs/misc/debrepo/conda stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/conda.list sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install conda -y source /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh conda init conda config --set auto_activate_base false
docs.title: Conda

docs.text: Passwordless sudo linux echo -e "\n $USER ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL\n" | sudo tee -a /etc/sudoers Prerequisite ubuntu sudo apt-get install -y \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ wget curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common \ vim \ gcc g++ make \ git \ python3 python3-dev python3-pip \ snapd \ default-jdk Terminus https://github.com/Eugeny/terminus ubuntu export VERSION = "1.0.142" wget https://github.com/Eugeny/terminus/releases/download/v $VERSION /terminus- $VERSION -linux.deb -O /tmp/terminus.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/terminus.deb mkdir -p ~/.config/terminus/ wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sukratkashyap/machine-setup/master/configs/terminus.yaml" -O ~/.config/terminus/config.yaml Google Chrome ubuntu wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb -O /tmp/google-chrome.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/google-chrome.deb Docker linux curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh bash get-docker.sh sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
docs.title: Start

docs.text: linux echo -e "\n $USER ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL\n" | sudo tee -a /etc/sudoers
docs.title: Passwordless sudo

docs.text: ubuntu sudo apt-get install -y \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ wget curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common \ vim \ gcc g++ make \ git \ python3 python3-dev python3-pip \ snapd \ default-jdk
docs.title: Prerequisite

docs.text: https://github.com/Eugeny/terminus ubuntu export VERSION = "1.0.142" wget https://github.com/Eugeny/terminus/releases/download/v $VERSION /terminus- $VERSION -linux.deb -O /tmp/terminus.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/terminus.deb mkdir -p ~/.config/terminus/ wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sukratkashyap/machine-setup/master/configs/terminus.yaml" -O ~/.config/terminus/config.yaml
docs.title: Terminus

docs.text: ubuntu wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb -O /tmp/google-chrome.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/google-chrome.deb
docs.title: Google Chrome

docs.text: linux curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh bash get-docker.sh sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
docs.title: Docker

docs.text: Kubernetes ubuntu sudo snap install kubectl --classic sudo snap install helm --classic export VERSION = "v0.11.1" sudo wget https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/kind/releases/download/ $VERSION /kind-linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/kind sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/kind Cloud ubuntu sudo snap install doctl Virtual Box https://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/6.1.22/ ubuntu wget https://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/6.1.22/virtualbox-6.1_6.1.22-144080~Ubuntu~eoan_amd64.deb -O /tmp/virtualbox.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/virtualbox.deb Vagrant ubuntu curl -fsSL https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-add-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com $( lsb_release -cs ) main" sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vagrant Teamviewer ubuntu wget https://download.teamviewer.com/download/linux/teamviewer_amd64.deb -O /tmp/teamviewer.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/teamviewer.deb Zoom ubuntu wget https://zoom.us/client/latest/zoom_amd64.deb -O /tmp/zoom.deb sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/zoom.deb
docs.title: Tools

docs.text: ubuntu sudo snap install kubectl --classic sudo snap install helm --classic export VERSION = "v0.11.1" sudo wget https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/kind/releases/download/ $VERSION /kind-linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/kind sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/kind
docs.title: Kubernetes

docs.title: Vagrant
